name: pink-nectar
effect: Changes Oricorio to Pa’u Style. Single-use and cannot be used in battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The flower nectar obtained at the flowering shrubs on Royal Avenue. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The flower nectar obtained at the flowering shrubs on Royal Avenue. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A flower nectar obtained from the flowering shrubs on Royal Avenue. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.
